next.title: Short sellers down a net $54 billion on U.S. positions so far this year, data provider says https://t.co/STqYN86sjt

localize.full_text: 数据提供商称，今年以来，空头在美仓位上净减540亿美元，https://t.co/STqYN86sjt。
